hero.description: Full Stack Developer with training in video game programming and a solid foundation in modern web technologies. Experience in full application development, open source contributions, and remote team work.

items.degree: Higher Degree in 3D Animation, Games and Interactive Environments

items.event: CaixaBank Tech Coding Challenge: Frontend React - Round 3

positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description: SaaS platform for creating incredible games in minutes. Democratizing gamification for companies.
responsibilities: Implemented interactive frontend features for mini-games and gamified learning experiences.
Built reusable UI components with Material UI, ensuring consistent styling and responsive design.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams including designers to deliver new features and resolve issues.
Participated in code reviews and maintained readable and scalable codebases using Git.

items.project: Official Website of Lola Lolita Land
contributions: Refactored the FAQ section layout and styling for improved readability and consistency.
Improved mobile responsiveness by adjusting padding, font sizes, margins, and layouts across multiple sections.
Replaced PNG assets with SVGs for brands like DKNY, Trolli, and Donettes, boosting performance and scalability.
Developed and integrated a Back to Top button and added prev/next buttons for easier navigation in the image lightbox.
Optimized responsive hero images and updated styles to improve the mobile viewing experience.
Enhanced accessibility by improving contrast and addressing visibility issues for header elements and the buy button on smaller screens.
Added a Google Calendar link with an icon to the Hero section for easier event access.
Introduced a BubbleBackground component in the gallery and sponsors sections for a more dynamic and engaging design.
Fixed zoom control behavior, improved mobile menu close functionality, and ensured all buttons were visible and functional across devices.
Standardized and corrected text formatting across the website (e.g., 'Lola Lolita Land') for consistency.

items.project: Official Website of La Velada de Ibai Llanos
contributions: Increased header height for improved layout and design consistency.
Fixed text layer z-index issue on the Hero section to enhance visual hierarchy.
Updated header logo size and source for better branding and visual impact.

yana.title: You Are Not Alone
responsibilities: Led a team of 3 frontend developers
Created reusable components for a consistent interface
Implemented multilingual support and responsive design

taskit.title: Task It App
responsibilities: Led database design, UI/UX, backend and frontend development
Integrated Google Maps for location-based tasks
